name: OFI Limited
description: Operator of a managed services firm focused on digital transformation in automation services. The company offers a plethora of services, such as public cloud management, data center services, process automation, and development, and helps customers try new concepts and improve current return on investment to benefit from expertise at competitive pricing, thereby enabling clients to reach their potential through technological solutions that are suitable for their needs.
one_liner: Operator of a managed services firm focused on digital transformation in automation services. The company offers a plethora of services, such as public cloud management, data center services, process automation, and development, and helps customers try new concepts and improve current return on investment to benefit from expertise at competitive pricing, thereby enabling clients to reach their potential through technological solutions that are suitable for their needs.
